docs.snippet: Participants at a Vatican conference on organ trafficking challenged China on Tuesday to allow independent scrutiny to ensure it is no longer using organs from executed prisoners, saying Chinese assurances aren't enough to prove the transplant pro...
docs.lead_paragraph: Participants at a Vatican conference on organ trafficking challenged China on Tuesday to allow independent scrutiny to ensure it is no longer using organs from executed prisoners, saying Chinese assurances aren't enough to prove the transplant program has been reformed.

headline.main: Sparks Fly as Vatican Conference Challenges China on Organs
headline.print_headline: Sparks Fly as Vatican Conference Challenges China on Organs

docs.snippet: The dollar will resume its upward climb in the coming year, but extreme near-term moves in either direction are possible, driven more by U.S. President Donald Trump's expected fiscal stimulus than by his words, a Reuters poll found....
docs.lead_paragraph: The dollar will resume its upward climb in the coming year, but extreme near-term moves in either direction are possible, driven more by U.S. President Donald Trump's expected fiscal stimulus than by his words, a Reuters poll found.

headline.main: Trump's Policies to Drive FX, but Strong Dollar Here to Stay: Reuters Poll
